title: Three research visits in Malcolm Atkinson's group at the University of Edinburgh, UK
Research visit in Ewa Deelman's group, Information Sciences Institute, University of Southern California, Los Angeles, US
Research visit in Ian Atkinson's group, eResearch Centre, James Cook University, Townsville, Australia
Research visit in David Abramson's group at The University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia
Research visit in Jarek Nabrzyski's group, Center for Research Computing, University of Notre Dame, US
Seven research visits in Malcolm Atkinson's group (formerly Jano van Hemert's group) at the e-Science Institute Edinburgh, UK
Research visit in Peter Kacsuk's group at the MTA SZTAKI, Computer and Automation Research Institute, Hungarian Academy of Sciences, Budapest, Hungary
Research visit in Shantenu Jha's group at the CCT, LSU, Baton Rouge, US
